text: We absolutely love this school! Our son has made incredible progress since joining. The Montessori approach has really fostered his independence, and we can see the positive impact every day. The teachers are wonderful, you can tell they genuinely care about the children and their work.

Wonderful pre school with  caring ,nurturing teachers. they follow a play and learn methodology. as this place is located right next to bedok reservoir, the children get to go out and play often. This is a great pre school
